short_summary: Ship repair and refit of Pierre Radisson.
description: The contract is for the refit and repair of the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (C.C.G.S.) Pierre Radisson during the 2022 Fall season in Quebec City, and includes any unscheduled work not covered in the technical specifications. The contract requires that the work be performed by a qualified contractor with the required expertise and resources.
duration_in_months: With an expected start date of October 11, 2022 and an ending date of October 12, 2023.
